newsitem.title: UK: Independent Insurance up on Warburg upgrade.
newsitem.headline: Independent Insurance up on Warburg upgrade.

text.p: Shares in Independent Insurance Plc were marked up to their highest level ever on Thursday after SBC Warburg upgraded its profit forecast, dealers said.
At 0830 GMT, the shares were quoted 23-1/2p higher at 776, surpassing its previous peak at 755, amid a generally flat-to-weaker insurance sector.
The brokerage repeated its "buy" stance and raised its profit forecast, targeting the 10 stg level for the shares, dealers said.
The analyst at SBC Warburg declined to comment on the recommendation. --London Newsroom +44 171 542 5106
